title: Riot gifted me
body: I logged in to league of legends and it opened the gift thing and said that i got goalkeeper blitzcrank gift cuz i havent flamed, but it seems like i didnt receive the skin, cant play with it and i dont see it in my blitzcrank menu

replies.body:
After a quick peek, I wasn't able to find that skin on your account. I recommend reaching out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this further.

Let me know if you have any questions.
